input.sentences: even though the weather was a bit cloudy we decided to go for a bike ride .
we were so glad we went because the views of the golf courses really showed off how green the area is .
and even with the big boats in the background you just ca n't beat a view of the water .
even though there was n't much sun it was very humid out so we stopped a good bit to refuel .
we met some other nice bikers along the way and decided to have lunch together .
output.sentences: The weather was right, so we went on a bike ride.
Along the way there were views of a green golf course.
Since we're in CA, we got great views of the water too.
Eventually we stopped to refuel in the sun.
I met nice friends on my ride, and we enjoyed a delicious lunch at the end.
